text:
Jet.com | Hoboken, New Jersey (NYC area) | Onsite | Full Time | eCommerce

Director of Product Management https://jet.com/about-us/working-at-jet/jobs?gh_jid=113870

We're looking for someone to lead our team of PMs building out our customer facing product (web and apps).

Please apply online or email me at my first name @ our url.
